explanation:
code_hardening: Added guards for null/empty text, invalid dimensions, and non-positive base text size; included a null check for the ellipsis string; constrained the resize loop with a named decrement step to avoid accidental infinite loops.
resolve_compilation_errors: Matched the existing AutoResizeTextView context by using available fields and methods (getTextHeight, mSpacingAdd/mSpacingMult, mTextResizeListener, setTextSize with TypedValue); relied on existing Android classes already used elsewhere in the file.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: Preserved the original resizing, measuring, and ellipsis logic exactly; confirmed resizing is triggered by onLayout and uses StaticLayout with spacing parameters consistent with the class behavior.
refactoring: Improved readability with final locals, clearer variable naming, and a named decrementStep constant while keeping behavior unchanged.
misc: Cleaned up comments and formatting to align with the surrounding project style; no new custom API calls introduced.
